Husband needed some shirts before our vacation back in Sep. Picked up two of these one in a different color. Husband loved them so well that he wanted 2 more in different colors. One shirt didn't make it in time for the vacation but that was all right because it was only a 3 day vacation. Husband normally wears 2XL so we ordered the XX-Large size and they fit great ♥ The reason for the one star is that if the shirts were 2 inchs longer all the way around then they would have fit beautifully! ♥ Next time a Big and Tall size if they make them. Plus they wrinkle something awful at times. I don't know if it was the change in the humidity or what but it was the oddest thing?
